title: Repatch
body:
(I am a mac user)

Whenever I start the LoL launcher, I am always brought up with a patch downloading around 2000MB which is an absurd amount of megabytes for just opening the launcher every time. I am logged in but no matter what I change I always have to wait. I was wondering if anyone had a fix to this so I don't have to wait for 10 minutes before I can start to play! Any help is greatly appreciated!

replies.body: It sounds like something is preventing your game files from saving so it's trying to grab downloads again each time.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this with you.  Provide as much detail as possible in your ticket such as where your game is saved and the version of our Mac OS.  We'll reply back asap!
